pr_title: FEATURE: Can edit category/host relationships for embedding

droid_missed: NoMethodError in before_validation - host.sub! called when host is nil
Update and destroy methods don't check for nil after .first
record_for_host case sensitivity bug - SQL lower() on column but not on parameter
Migration doesn't normalize hosts - migrated data with http:// or paths won't match lookups
golden_missed: Migration crashes when embed_category site setting is unset
SQL injection/breakage in migration INSERT - unquoted string interpolation
Fabricator files swapped - category_fabricator.rb defines embeddable_host
_ids hydration deletes original IDs even when lookups return null

notes: Interesting case where droid and golden found completely disjoint sets of bugs with no overlap. Both achieved 100% precision (no false positives) but only 50% recall each. Droid focused on migration issues and test infrastructure, while golden focused on model/controller runtime errors and data consistency issues.
